pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric and Semiparametric Mixture Estimation // Mainly for maximum likelihood estimation of nonparametric and semiparametric mixture models, but can also be used for fitting finite mixtures. The algorithms are developed in Wang (2007) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2007.00583.x and Wang (2010) doi:10.1007/s11222-009-9117-z.
